storyInfo: The Sanguinarch of Vampires burns Cumberland Manor to the ground and executes many nobles. Catherine faces the Sarkaz mercenaries in order to protect the others in the factory.

attributes.text: There are some things that will never change, Ailshie!
I'll grow up to be a Steam Knight, just like Sir Lynch! No, even greater than Sir Lynch!
I'll protect you all, and I'll drive every scoundrel away.
I'll uphold the glory of Cumberland, just like my great-great-great-great grandmother!
I promise this, Ailshie! You'll see!

attributes.content: Ailshie!
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Hold on! I, I'll...
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: I promised that I'd...
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Go, Allerdale.
The Vampire is coming. He cannot find you.
Ailshie is here. I have toâ€”
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: You have to follow her orders. She will not allow you to deviate.
Y-You can't...
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: We can. The Duke has ordered us to help you 'complete your mission', but we are not your servants.
Do not forget her instructions.
Do not forget your place.
There is only one thing that you must do. Fulfill your duty.
For an instant, Allerdale forgets where she is, and who is with her.
She wants to run, towards the fire that is burning away at what little remains of her life.
Just like that night twenty-six years ago, when she wanted to run towards another fire to stop Parliament's men from taking her father.
That is your sole responsibility.
Allerdale's eyes open wide. The tears in them evaporate before the fire.
But she sees a great silhouette is rising in the burning garden.
Is it the damaged suit of steam armor? The steam armor upon which she placed so many dreams and hopes?
Return to the person of interest. Now.
Through so many trials and tribulations, Allerdale had prayed that her great ancestor would descend into the steam armor and help her overcome all challenges.
Now she sees the ancient armor breathing the flames of hell.
She sees the shadow in the fire roar towards her.
It is not her hope. She has strayed far from it.
Even if her ancestor truly returnedâ€”
Allerdale knows it could only be her worst nightmare.
Tell her.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: I will obey her will, as always.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: I, I don't understand, Your Highness...
attributes.name: Slimy Noble

attributes.content: I thought you were pleased with our hospitality...
attributes.name: Slimy Noble

attributes.content: You even graced us with your presence at our banquets, did you not? You liked this place!
attributes.name: Slimy Noble

attributes.content: I will not deny that you have brought me joy, from time to time.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: I find your petty flattery and exaggerated cordiality adorable.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: You must be mistaken! I have no links to the dukes or the resistance! I swear...
attributes.name: Slimy Noble

attributes.content: Any trouble must be the work of the Cumberland woman! I'll expose her!
attributes.name: Slimy Noble

attributes.content: Sanguinarch... Your Highness... please, I'll give you anything! My collection, my money... take all of it! Just...
attributes.name: Slimy Noble

attributes.content: What good are those to me, my dear?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: You wouldn't kill me, would you? We should hold a wine tasting! You haven't sampled my private reserve yet...
attributes.name: Slimy Noble

attributes.content: I'll be alright, won't I, Lt. Colonel Lettou? This is Londinium!
attributes.name: Slimy Noble

attributes.content: Theyâ€”the Sarkaz are just here to protect Londinium at the invitation of the Duke of Cavendish? They wouldn't kill an innocent, of course?
attributes.name: Slimy Noble

attributes.content: Take him to the front.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: I tire of the noise. Begin.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: B-Begin what?
attributes.name: Slimy Noble

attributes.content: Run in when you hear the order.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Confirm everyone is dead and you can come back alive.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: In... into the fire? A fire that big? N-No! I'll burn to death!
attributes.name: Slimy Noble

attributes.content: You're going to do exactly that.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: The ancient Sarkaz steps on the Heart of Victoria and raises a finger.
Arghâ€”!
attributes.name: Slimy Noble

attributes.content: He did not see what was chasing him.
As the Sarkaz warrior said, he follows the order instinctively, running forward like a man possessed.
In the fire, the slightest chance of survival. On his tail, the scent of certain death.
But he only takes a few steps before stumbling in confusion.
Blood spurts from his body.
It no longer belongs to him. It serves another master now.
At its new master's command, it charges forth towards the collapsing manor, towards the raging flames, chewing through the ruins, swallowing the rubble, covering the cinders.
Nothing can stop the march of blood, not even fire.
He was right, Lettou.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: I haven't sampled his private reserve.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: We should, shouldn't we?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: This is it. Wait here.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: Lund, Charlie...
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: This is where you kill us.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: ...How do you know?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: Simple.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: You never told the workers what you were building for the past two years.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: But a factory boss gets a few clues.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: I guessed you were close to the final stages, the way you people have been pressing us lately. And that means it's time for those who know too much to die.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: You lied to me.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: Just getting my affairs in order.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: What could lowly workers like us do, after groveling for the past three years?
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Don't you dare try anything.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: You, you and you. Come with me; we'll take a look around.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: Keep a close eye on her, Paprika.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Can I have a smoke?
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Hm... okay.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Thanks.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Did you ever consider running?
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Where?
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: And anyway, it'd only make trouble for the workers left behind.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: I've been thinking about what you'd do to us. Looks like whoever's giving the orders still has something of a heart.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: But... what do you mean?
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: They said to get rid of us quietly so the workers don't panic, didn't they?
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: If my life buys a chance for the others to live, then so be it.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: You think the rest of the old timers you brought here don't get that?
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: I don't get it...
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Huff...
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: How old are you, girl?
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Doctor, do you know the story of the Steam Knights?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Granny used to build them.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: It was a point of pride for us.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: With our own hands, we built the armor worn by the defenders of Londinium, the ones who defended our home.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: I wanted to see the birth of those great things, just like Granny... to take part in it.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Granny's been through a lot. She saw how Londinium became what it is today. And I can see how disappointed she is.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: But I don't want to give up so soon.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Must be this drawer.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Hidden compartment... hidden compartment... ah, here it is.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Granny's incredible. I'd never know this desk had been altered, if she hadn't told me.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: This is... my badge?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: And a notebook?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.text: I don't know who I'm writing this for, what I'm writing this for.
Harvey died before Feist was born.
Lindy tried to understand, but her sorrow turned into anger towards me. She blamed me for not stopping Harvey that day.
I couldn't argue with her. I couldn't blame her for leaving Feist behind.
I heard she remarried someone decent. Good for her.
I never told Feist. I didn't want him to know that his father died for nothing, and that his mother left with hate in her heart.

attributes.content: So you grew up in Columbia.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Yes, my grandma raised me.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Mom and Dad were both mercenaries, but they're dead.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Why did you become a mercenary, then?
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: To feed myself, and grandma.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Sarkaz aren't welcome most places, so I had to be a merc.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: What a good girl.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: So you agree with the Regent?
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: You mean with occupying the city?
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Hmm... I don't know.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: We do what we're paid to do. I didn't know we were going to occupy such a big city.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: In Columbia, we were helping merchants smuggle goods that they didn't want people to know about, or hunting wild beasts.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: But I can tell you, that was the first time I saw Grimm so excited. He said the Sarkaz would get to live a decent life, if we were successful.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Grimm? The smoker?
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Where's he now? I haven't seen him around in a while.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: He's dead.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Aren't you sad about that?
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: He always said that death and parting are a normal part of the mercenary life.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Death and parting. All these years of chaos, and the Victorians haven't learned the slightest thing about the Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Catch, girl.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Catherine takes a little thing from her cigarette box and tosses it at Paprika.
It is small, soft, made of wool, and bright in color.
This is... a finger sleeve...
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Grimm...
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: You made it for the old merc, didn't you?
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: His finger hurt because of an old wound, but he couldn't cut the smoking habit. I saw him hide it in his cigarette box.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Guess he didn't want to get it dirty, even though you made it for him to use.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: He gave me the box when he left. Payment for smokes, those few months.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: He never talked about you, but the moment I saw you, I knew you were the girl he was always thinking about.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: I... I don't...
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: I don't know what he thought about the war.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: But I know, without hearing it from him... you don't know what war is.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.text: I had a feeling Feist would leave.
He's too much like Harvey.
He thinks he can solve every problem with his wits.
Seeing him reminds me of Harvey.
I can't tell if I'm disappointed because the protest failed, or because Harvey didn't understand what the nobles were made of.
Maybe a little bit of both.
I let Feist go.
I knew I couldn't stop him.

attributes.content: Doctor, I thought about what I was going to say to Granny, before I brought you back.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: I thought I was prepared. We've seen so much in our time.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: But I think I owe her an apology.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.options: You're family.;She doesn't need your apology, does she?

attributes.content: Catherine always looks strict and solemn. People forget that she's just an ordinary woman, who lost her livelihood.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.text: The Sarkaz don't let workers into certain areas of the factories. They're definitely preparing some sort of weapon.
They shouldn't have the resources to hold out this long, not with the dukes breathing down their necks.
But from the material being sent to the factories, with what I know of their situation, all the signs point to them having their own supply line.
None of this was supposed to concern me.
All I can do is protect the workers.
Butâ€”
I noted things I shouldn't have.
Maybe, deep down, I thought I could do more than I did when I watched Harvey go out into the streets, if Feist came back to me for help someday.
Workers aren't allowed near it, but I know the place too well.
There are only a few places suitable for a supply depot.

attributes.content: Here, Doctor! Granny circled some places on the map.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.options: They'll be heavily guarded.;I hope we get results on the other side.

attributes.content: Yes, it'll be hard to get close to the depots.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: This information will help, though, even if we can't get close.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: I wish I could say goodbye to Granny.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Guess it'll have to wait until next time.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Let's go, Doctor.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: A lot of us don't actually know what we're fighting for.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: It's just, we don't have a place to go. We're not welcome anywhere.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: The King of Sarkaz promised us a home, a country, a future.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: I've spent time with you people. I can tell that some of you haven't actually fought before.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: What about you?
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: I can fight!
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Have you killed anyone, girl? And I'm not talking about a villain you can kill without remorse... I mean real people.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: You're just a worker. You haven't killed anyone. Don't talk to me like you know what it means.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: You've been in Londinium for a while. You've heard of steam armor, haven't you?
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: I heard it's a powerful weapon that hasn't been seen for a long time.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Yes. It's a killing machine.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: I built killing machine after killing machine with these hands right here.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: I don't feel ashamed, because those machines were used to defend the land I lived on.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: What about you, girl? Do you know what your weapon is for?
attributes.name: Catherine
